WorkPlace.Name: JT WORKS ApS
WorkPlace.Description: JTWORKS.dk er 100% Dansk ejet og en seriøs samarbejdspartner. Vi har en bred erhvervserfarring på arbejdsmarkedet. Vi rekrutterer og udlejer såvel faglært som ufaglært arbejdskraft. Vi leverer professionelle bemandingsløsninger, inden for en lang række fagområder. Uanset om der er tale om ekstra kapicitet i en periode eller en mere permanent løsning, tilbyder vi vikar assistance til virksomheder og private.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: ARE YOU A SKILLED WELDER LOOKING FOR NEW CHALLENGES?
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are currently looking for a skilled and experienced MAG-welder for a long-term project near Herning.

Practical information:

  • Start date: ASAP
  • Payment according to qualifications + pension, holiday-money and SH
  • Duties: MAG-welding
  • Working Schedule: 37h/week or 46h/week
  • Working clothes and tools are provided

You will be working with a polish colleague, so we prefer you speak English or Polish. We expect that you are committed, hardworking and quality-oriented.

If you are interested in hearing more about our position, then don’t hesitate to contact us: fek@jtworks.dk / 53774802
